title: News from the Virasoro algebra
abstract: It is shown that the local quantum field theory of the chiral energy- momentum tensor with central charge $c=1$ coincides with the gauge invariant subtheory of the chiral $SU(2)$ current algebra at level 1, where the gauge group is the global $SU(2)$ symmetry. At higher level, the same scheme gives rise to $W$-algebra extensions of the Virasoro algebra.
